org.apache.flink.yarn.highavailability

类 YarnHighAvailabilityServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.yarn.highavailability.YarnHighAvailabilityServices
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, HighAvailabilityServices
    直接已知子类:
    AbstractYarnNonHaServices

    public abstract class YarnHighAvailabilityServices
extends java.lang.Object
implements HighAvailabilityServices
    The basis of HighAvailabilityServices for YARN setups. These high-availability services auto-configure YARN's HDFS and the YARN application's working directory to be used to store job recovery data.

    Note for implementers: This class locks access to and creation of services, to make sure all services are properly shut down when shutting down this class. To participate in the checks, overriding methods should frame method body with calls to enter() and exit() as shown in the following pattern: 

    
 public LeaderRetrievalService getResourceManagerLeaderRetriever() {
     enter();
     try {
         CuratorClient client = getCuratorClient();
         return ZooKeeperUtils.createLeaderRetrievalService(client, configuration, RESOURCE_MANAGER_LEADER_PATH);
     } finally {
         exit();
     }
 }

      The lock that guards all accesses to methods in this class.

        The directory for HA persistent data. This should be deleted when the HA services clean up.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • YarnHighAvailabilityServices

        protected YarnHighAvailabilityServices(Configuration config,
                                       Configuration hadoopConf)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Creates new YARN high-availability services, configuring the file system and recovery data directory based on the working directory in the given Hadoop configuration.

        This class requires that the default Hadoop file system configured in the given Hadoop configuration is an HDFS.

        参数:
        config - The Flink configuration of this component / process.
        hadoopConf - The Hadoop configuration for the YARN cluster.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the initialization of the Hadoop file system used by YARN fails.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createBlobStore

        public BlobStore createBlobStore()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: HighAvailabilityServices
        Creates the BLOB store in which BLOBs are stored in a highly-available fashion.
        指定者:
        createBlobStore 在接口中 HighAvailabilityServices
        返回:
        Blob store
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the blob store could not be created

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Checks whether these services have been shut down.
        返回:
        True, if this instance has been shut down, false if it still operational.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: HighAvailabilityServices
        Closes the high availability services, releasing all resources.

        This method does not delete or clean up any data stored in external stores (file systems, ZooKeeper, etc). Another instance of the high availability services will be able to recover the job.

        If an exception occurs during closing services, this method will attempt to continue closing other services and report exceptions only after all services have been attempted to be closed.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 java.lang.AutoCloseable
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 HighAvailabilityServices
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if an exception occurred while closing these services.

      • closeAndCleanupAllData

        public void closeAndCleanupAllData()
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: HighAvailabilityServices
        Closes the high availability services (releasing all resources) and deletes all data stored by these services in external stores.

        After this method was called, the any job or session that was managed by these high availability services will be unrecoverable.

        If an exception occurs during cleanup, this method will attempt to continue the cleanup and report exceptions only after all cleanup steps have been attempted.

        指定者:
        closeAndCleanupAllData 在接口中 HighAvailabilityServices
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if an exception occurred while closing these services or cleaning up data stored by them.

      • enter

        void enter()
        To be called at the beginning of every method that creates an HA service. Acquires the lock and check whether this HighAvailabilityServices instance is shut down.

      • enterUnlessClosed

        boolean enterUnlessClosed()
        Acquires the lock and checks whether the services are already closed. If they are already closed, the method releases the lock and returns false.
        返回:
        True, if the lock was acquired and the services are not closed, false if the services are closed.

      • exit

        void exit()
        To be called at the end of every method that creates an HA service. Releases the lock.

      • forSingleJobAppMaster

        public static YarnHighAvailabilityServices forSingleJobAppMaster(Configuration flinkConfig,
                                                                 Configuration hadoopConfig)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the high-availability services for a single-job Flink YARN application, to be used in the Application Master that runs both ResourceManager and JobManager.
        参数:
        flinkConfig - The Flink configuration.
        hadoopConfig - The Hadoop configuration for the YARN cluster.
        返回:
        The created high-availability services.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the high-availability services could not be initialized.

      • forYarnTaskManager

        public static YarnHighAvailabilityServices forYarnTaskManager(Configuration flinkConfig,

        Creates the high-availability services for the TaskManagers participating in a Flink YARN application.
        参数:

        hadoopConfig - The Hadoop configuration for the YARN cluster.
        返回:

        抛出:
